remarks: There are exactly ` phi ( N ) ` Dirichlet characters modulo ` N ` . Part of Theorem 6.5.1 of [Shapiro] p. 230.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Apr-2016.)
statement:
sumdchr.g $e |- G = ( DChr ` N ) $.
sumdchr.d $e |- D = ( Base ` G ) $.
dchrhash $p |- ( N e. NN -> ( # ` D ) = ( phi ` N ) ) $.
